title: Max Factory Muv-Luv Alternative: Meiya Mitsurugi Figma Action Figure (UN Troop Version)
description: From Max Factory. Do not dishonor mankind!! From the popular PC game Muv-Luv Alternative, comes a figma of Meiya Mitsurugi in her UN Army armour! Using the smooth yet poseable joints of figma, you can act out various scenes. Her characteristic armour has been faithfully recreated to match the original, with various areas make use of a flexible plastic allowing the proportions to be kept, without compromising posability. 'Minarukamui', her symbolic sword is included, and can be sheathed and removed from her scabbard. Other than her default expression, an additional shouting expression is included to recreate Meiya's gallant fighing image. Hand parts allowing her to weild her sword are included, as well as various other hand parts, coming to a total of four hand parts for each hand. Comes with a poseable figma stand that makes it possible to recreate various scenes.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "8.82 x 5.98 x 2.91 inches", "Item Weight": "7.1 ounces", "Manufacturer": "Max Factory", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Date First Available": "July 22, 2009"}
